articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: Philips Hue bulbs will be even more expensive in July. And it may not end there. - Ars Technica
articles.description: Some Hue products already cost more in the US than they do elsewhere.

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Microsoft extends free Windows 10 security updates into 2026, with strings attached - Ars Technica
articles.description: End-of-support date isn’t changing, but extra year will be functionally free.
